CutSceneText.Text: Kotia! I'm here for the food again, today.
Yes, here it is... But, how long are you going to continue doing this?
I'm sorry to worry you... But my hands are tied.
Well... I will come again next time. Thank you.
Karu! Sorry to make you waiting. You must be hungry... Hurry and eat.
You poor little thing. You are just like me, a lonely orphan...
But don't worry, I'll always be by your side, protecting you...
Who... Who are you?! Are you here to take me away?
What is the name of that little fellow?
His name is Karu. He is a lost orphan like me, and I've been taking care of him.
Garis... Why don't you give yourself up now?
He will die of hunger if I just leave him here. And I can't take him with me to the barracks, either...
So I must stay here and protect him!
But, you can't be on the run forever, right? Think of your future!
But, it's too late now. Even if I was to return now...
Actually... I already reported about you to Commander Keyhawk.
He was angry at first, but he said he'll look the other way as long as you keep him hidden from other people.
Is... is that really true?
Yes. So, let's go back to the unit.
Thank you, Kotia... Sniff sniff...
Ka... Karu! Stop it!
He's not dead yet. We should be able to save him if we take him quickly to the hospital.
Kotia...
Actually, I already reported about you to Commander Keyhawk.
What?
He was angry at first, but he said he'll look the other way as long as you keep him hidden from other people.
Is... is that really true?
Yes. So, let's go back to the unit.
Thank you, Kotia... Sniff sniff...
